Closet MR Fans in Colorado?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Closet MR Fans in Colorado?
By Monster Fenrick on Thursday, July 1, 2004 - 06:00 am:

Just last night while on the road I was waiting patiently to take a right turn at a red light intersection when what drives by me on the intersecting road???....

A Blue/green car with PIXIE airbrushed on the side! You can trust me to know that it was definately Pixie as opposed to some pixie-ish look-a-like. It was almost a full body Pixie that appeared to be a pose from the Battlecard Ep II poses from a card. it was slightly sideways to fit more of the pixie on the side.

Anyway, just thought i'd share the odd suprise I had.

By DarkPalidan on Thursday, July 1, 2004 - 07:24 am:

Wow! I wonder if it was anyone here at MRM?

By Petit-Trot on Thursday, July 1, 2004 - 09:14 am:

Having a pixie painted on one's car is not exactly my definiton of closeting.

By lileave on Thursday, July 1, 2004 - 10:39 am:

By lileave on Thursday, July 1, 2004 - 11:06 am:

By MrGG on Sunday, July 4, 2004 - 03:21 pm:

By Caramel Zer0 on Sunday, July 4, 2004 - 03:28 pm:

By MrGG on Sunday, July 4, 2004 - 03:56 pm:

By Monster Fenrick on Tuesday, July 6, 2004 - 11:06 am:

Since I was waiting to turn into traffic, I didn't get to catch up to it to see what type of car it was. It seemed like a suped up Dodge Neon or similar body style. I have not seen the car before, nor have I seen it since. Maybe it was from outta town. I was too busy looking at the Pixie to make sure it was really pixie from MR.

By alphamone on Saturday, July 10, 2004 - 08:34 pm:
